name: Dinosaur Escape
description:
This is a horror escape game with a simple plot: escape before the dinosaur finds and eats you! Test your skills as you escape this horrific maze. Just follow the instructions given and enjoy! I would also really enjoy some feedback!

I fully realize that the game is not 100% complete and there is definitely some bugs and glitches. This is my first game so far and was created using Blender v2.79b.

If you would like to see a quick behind the scenes video regarding the game, feel free to check out my YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCy449sDNs2PRR8Sqt1UqgwQ

Most game sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com
